about_the_game:
Divine Move

This game is inspired by a significant international Go competition in January 2025, which ended with dramatic and controversial results.

  • This is not a Go game. The game supports up to 8 players, with players taking turns using the same mouse to play.

  • Each player's block contains a certain number of gems. The next player will collect these gems. The longer a block stays on the board, the more gems it accumulates. When the last block is placed ,the player who collects more gems than the target amount wins.

  • Purchase special items: You can buy various cards and items in the shop to enhance the gem's extra rewards. Use your funds wisely.

    • 20 variant shapes,

    • 40 types of cards,

    • 50 items,

    • Any item may change the course of the game.

  • Build your best profit combination: Each round requires you to filter your blocks and adjust your deck to maximize your profits.

  • Beware of robbers: Through various items or cards, other players may steal your gems. Of course, you can steal theirs too.

  • Level editor and Creative Workshop: You can design scenes yourself and share them in the Creative Workshop for other players to download.

  • Don't let high-value blocks fall: If a block falls, it will not yield any rewards. Plan your strategy carefully, and think about how to place high-value blocks. If necessary, sacrifice low-value blocks.
detailed_description:
Divine Move

This game is inspired by a significant international Go competition in January 2025, which ended with dramatic and controversial results.

  • This is not a Go game. The game supports up to 8 players, with players taking turns using the same mouse to play.

  • Each player's block contains a certain number of gems. The next player will collect these gems. The longer a block stays on the board, the more gems it accumulates. When the last block is placed ,the player who collects more gems than the target amount wins.

  • Purchase special items: You can buy various cards and items in the shop to enhance the gem's extra rewards. Use your funds wisely.

    • 20 variant shapes,

    • 40 types of cards,

    • 50 items,

    • Any item may change the course of the game.

  • Build your best profit combination: Each round requires you to filter your blocks and adjust your deck to maximize your profits.

  • Beware of robbers: Through various items or cards, other players may steal your gems. Of course, you can steal theirs too.

  • Level editor and Creative Workshop: You can design scenes yourself and share them in the Creative Workshop for other players to download.

  • Don't let high-value blocks fall: If a block falls, it will not yield any rewards. Plan your strategy carefully, and think about how to place high-value blocks. If necessary, sacrifice low-value blocks.
name: Divine Move 神之手

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: win10
  • Processor: i5-8350
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1050
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: WIN11
  • Processor: i5-8350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: This is not a Go game. This game is designed to show that anything can happen beyond the board. Local multiplayer supports 1-8 players using only a single mouse. Victory Condition: When the last item is placed, the player who has collected more gems than the target amount wins.
supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Danish, Russian, Hungarian, Turkish, Greek, Norwegian, Japanese, Polish, Traditional Chinese, Finnish, Dutch, Portuguese - Portugal, Arabic, Czech, Swedish
